!Tataru Zu Hestui: Dejakyar Lamme! You have brought the Claw of the Totem Spirit! Magnificent! Young Mystic, now we shall perform a ritual in which we prick your tongue with the claw. Then you shall be able to speak the language of flame! [Quest _416_PathToOrcShaman tataru_zu_hestui_q0416_11a.htm|Perform the ritual]
